chapters.title: Prelude
chapters.info:
The Dragon,
      p. 9 (xi)â€”Name by which
      Lews Therin Telamon was known by during the War of
      the Shadow.  His Rebirth, the Dragon Reborn, is
      alive and fulfilling all of the Prophecies set to signal his return.
      See also
      al'Thor, Rand;
      Dragon Reborn;
      Telamon, Lews Therin.
